QuestData.Title: Soaked Pages
QuestData.Description: Those blasted Wretched sure can run fast at the sight of someone who'll stand up to them. But let's not worry about that now. I need to find my instructor's elemental grimoire.$B$BI'm certain I saw one of those cowards throw it into the river but I cannot seem to be able to locate it. I could use another set of eyes. I'll throw in a bit of coin if you spot it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Apprentice Meledor in Eversong Woods wants you to search the water beneath the bridge nearby and bring him Antheol's Elemental Grimoire.
QuestData.CompletionText: No luck? Well, keep looking. The book is of utmost importance, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: The book is completely soaked. Instructor Antheol's not going to like this at all.$B$BHere, take this money. I have an idea.
